subject: debian etch tools
body:
Hi, I noticed that in debian etch none of the tools for autoconfiguration 
stuff like autoconf, automake and other tools like this are not installed. 
If I do apt-get install autoconf it wants me to manually install more tools. 
Is there a package group name I can give apt-get that will install all of 
these tools to configure, build and install stuff like autoconf and 
automake? 


_______________________________________________

Speakup@braille.uwo.ca
